TITLE: Example Page
signatureRequired: You must enter a signature to proceed
fiveCahrs: The signature must be at least 5 characters
pkRequired: You need to enter a private key
pk66Chars: The key shoud consist of 66 chars
pk0x: The key shoud be in Hex, which means it starts with 0x and consist of A-F, 0-9
signatureDesc: A signature could be your full name, national ID or any information that indicates your identity
fileExtensionPlaceholder: The type of the uploaded file, example: txt, doc, png, mp3 ...
dropFiles: Drop file here or click to select files
privateKeyDesc: A private key is used to encrypt your file, so other people on the IPFS network won't be able to view it without your permission. if you don't have a previous asymmetric key pair, click on 'Generate Key Pair'
invoiceAlamah: Alamah is a tool to prove an ownership of any digital asset on a ceratin time using IPFS, FileCoin ,and Ethereum
